Class CheckTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.test.CCSMTestCaseBase

  • public abstract class CheckTestBase
extends CCSMTestCaseBase

    • Method Detail

      • generateParameters

        public static <T extends CheckTestBase> java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object[]> generateParameters(T instance)
                                                                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Creates smoke test parameters. Callers should be annotated with @Parameters(name = "{0}") to get proper names displayed.
        Parameters:
        instance - An instance of the implementing test class in order to search for corresponding test files.
        Returns:
        A list of constructor parameters for the test, the first being the expected file, the second being the map from simple class name to check info.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • generateParameters

        public static <T extends CheckTestBase> java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object[]> generateParameters(T instance,
                                                                                                    java.lang.Class<?> referenceClass)
                                                                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Creates smoke test parameters. Callers should be annotated with @Parameters(name = "{0}") to get proper names displayed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • buildCheckInfoMap

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CheckInfo> buildCheckInfoMap()
                                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Builds a map from simple class names to check infos. The simple class name must be unique. The rational here is avoid classes with same name in different packages (confusing) but also make the test-data more readable.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • buildCheckInfoMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CheckInfo> buildCheckInfoMap(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Builds a map from simple class names to check infos. The simple class name must be unique. The rational here is avoid classes with same name in different packages (confusing) but also make the test-data more readable. The clazz will be used to resolve the classpath to search for checks.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • findFiles

        protected java.util.List<java.io.File> findFiles()
        Returns all files that have the RESULT_EXTENSION.

          throws java.io.IOException,
